New Records: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning

Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning
Mookie Betts homered for the second straight night
Will Smith and Gavin Lux each hit a two-run homer for the Dodgers
Pre-Game Insights: San Diego held a 2-1 lead in their NLDS heading into Game 4 on Wednesday night
Post-Match Reflections: For the NL East champion Phillies, who won 95 games and finished six ahead of the wild-card Mets during the regular season, it was a bitter exit early in the playoffs and a disappointing step backward after they advanced to the 2022 World Series and then lost Games 6 and 7 of the 2023 NLCS at home to Arizona
Miscellaneous Highlights: The largest crowd in Comerica Park's 25-year history was 44,885
The Dodgers got a superb effort by opener Ryan Brasier and seven fellow relievers in a bullpen game, holding the Padres to seven hits
